structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Administrative Office of the Courts to maintain list of organizations to which persons sentenced to community labor for driving under the influence may work.
law.text:
The Administrative Office of the Courts shall:
Maintain a list of eligible organizations for whom persons sentenced under KRS 189A.020 may perform community service work and which have agreed to make proper reports to the court.
Develop and distribute such forms as necessary to ensure compliance with the reporting provisions of KRS 189A.020.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 13, effective July 13, 1984.
